messages: You are the most beautifull flower in the world's garden
Whenever you feel down, remember that you are extraordinary to me
I love you more than anything
Your laught make me melt, literally
When I'm in doubt, just a look at you bring me back
I trust you with all my heart and my soul
I miss you every seconds
Whenever I'm worried, as simple tought of you erase it
I love your chicken booty dance
You are my kindest soulmate
Everyday with you make me a better person
You are the proof to me that pure love and kindess exist and that everyone deserve it
I'm excited looking at you and thinking about the goods, past and future
You confirmed to me that the meaning of life is found in responsability, caring and becoming better
Your life is a matcha and you will perfect the receipe day by day
You are my angel, felt from the sky straight in my life
You are my best friend and I cherish every moments beside you
You can confide in me and I will always be there to hold you tight
No matter how down you are, grab my hand and I'll make you feel better, as you do to me
You are the best encounter that happenned in my life
